reuters.title: COMMERCIAL CREDIT <CCC> UNIT SELLS DIVISION
reuters.body: Commercial Credit Co said its American Health and Life Insurance Co sold its ordinary life insurance business to American National Insurance Co <ANAT>. American National will assume the business no later than August 31, 1987, Commercial Credit said. The sale is part of a restructuring program begun by Commercial Credit's subsidiary in late 1986, the company said. Reuter 
